levels.description: Self-destructs after 25 seconds, sending fireballs in the cardinal directions that deal <@ba.vup>{damage}</> Arts damage; Targets hit are afflicted with [Burning Breath] (Deals increasing True damage each second, but can be <$ba.buffres>resisted</>)
